item.content:encoded:
Buying a home is a huge step but a positive thing but it can be a bit scary. There are many things standing in your way, we’ll discuss here.  Here I’ll not coerce you about the price here. Track San Diego real estate market visit the website of National Associations of Realtors. I have put together a first time home buying guide. Have a great time!

Don’t Follow Unwise Advice.

Only buy a home if you’re monetarily ready, not,

  • As it’s a buyer’s market
  • As of low mortgage rates
  • As you want to be a proprietor

Search and make notes

Create a list of certain homes (from newspapers and websites) you are curious about and keep an eye on the market, keep note of any changes in requesting prices. This will provide you with a feel of the housing trends n styles in specific areas and ranges you are looking for.

Take a look at your finance

Use any “Mortgage Calculator” to see how much you can pay, depending on your financial situation. A generally known rule is to have three months of your housing payments. This will present you with a clear idea of the situation.

Get Mortgage Preapproval

Getting prequalified for a mortgage provides you a hint of what your loan program and the amount you probably will borrow might look like in advance.

Hire a Real Estate Consultant

Real estate agents have great experience about

  • buying/selling procedure
  • negotiating skills
  • understanding the area you want to live in

Keep an eye on the following points

  • Examine the plumbing
  • Electrical system
  • windows and doors
  • Are the other homes on the block properly managed?
  • Examine traffic on the streets near you.
  • Street parking?
  • Schools, shopping centers, restaurants, parks, and public transportation, near you?

Once you and the seller have reached a contract on a value, the house will go into escrow.

Check structural damage

This opportunity retains you by providing you a chance to renegotiate your offer or take it out without any penalty if the inspection reveals essential material damage. The buyer and the seller will obtain a report on the home inspector’s findings.

Get the help of the Mortgage Banker for Loan.

Contact a competent, responsive mortgage banker who will assist you in making the process easier and short.

A Neutral Home Appraised

A home appraisal is an honest judgment of the fair market worth of the home by an expertly-trained third person.

Paperwork and complete the deal.

For the paperwork, your lender will arrange a company to manage it. You just have to sign all the papers. It takes a day or two for your loan to be funded. Once the check is passed to the seller, you are ready to move into your new home!

Real estate is my passion and San Diego is my city.

Cory Segall
